column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////*The Malnati Chicago Classic - $21. Lou's blend of sausage
column3: and tomato on their signature buttercrust. Simple flavors that created something really delicious
column4: and after 2 slices pretty filling. I usually leave a scrapyard of pizza crust on my plate but not this time. My favorite was their super fresh tasting tomato sauce.     (
